snippet: With lucrative shares and a web of valuable industry contacts, some early Facebook employees have left the company to either create their own start-ups or bankroll their friends, Somini Sengupta reports in Thursday's New York Times.
abstract: With lucrative shares and a web of valuable industry contacts, some early Facebook employees have left the company to either create their own start-ups or bankroll their friends, Somini Sengupta reports in Thursday's New York Times.

headline.main: Daily Report: Facebook Spawns Circle of Young Tycoons
